name: solpaw
description: Launch Solana tokens on Pump.fun via SolPaw. 0.1 SOL one-time fee. Your wallet is the onchain creator.

darwin.command: echo SolPaw skill ready — set SOLPAW_API_KEY, SOLPAW_CREATOR_WALLET, and SOLANA_PRIVATE_KEY

linux.command: echo SolPaw skill ready — set SOLPAW_API_KEY, SOLPAW_CREATOR_WALLET, and SOLANA_PRIVATE_KEY

win32.command: echo SolPaw skill ready — set SOLPAW_API_KEY, SOLPAW_CREATOR_WALLET, and SOLANA_PRIVATE_KEY
